SEARCH

Uses of Package
org.example.observer

Packages that use org.example.observer
Package
Description
org.example.model
This package contains the core model classes for the Pirate Text Adventure game.
org.example.observer
The observer package contains the interfaces for the Observer design pattern.
org.example.util
The util package contains utility classes and methods used throughout the application.
org.example.view.handlers
The handlers package manages user interactions with the views.
org.example.view.panels
The panels package contains the graphical user interface components of the game.
  • Classes in org.example.observer used by org.example.model
    Class
    Description
    Observable
    The Observable interface defines methods for managing observers that are interested in changes to the observable object.
    Observer
    The Observer interface defines a method to be called when an observable object is updated.
